rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment factually reports presumptive positive cases using neutral language.
The segment reports factual announcement and findings ('announced... that three presumptive positive cases... were found').
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports presumptive positive cases but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
